title: Kiss: Person, Man, Light Skin Tone, Medium Skin Tone
description: A man and a person (gender unspecified) are kissing. The man has a light skin tone, and the other person has a medium skin tone. This emoji represents romantic affection and love between a couple with differing skin tones.
apple_vendor_description: This tender emoji on Apple devices portrays a romantic moment between a man with a light skin tone and another with a medium skin tone, leaning in for a kiss. Apple's design language imbues the figures with soft, rounded features and a subtle, warm glow, emphasizing affection and intimacy. It's a beautiful way to express love, closeness, and romantic sentiment in messages.
